answers.answer: I would assume it's normal if your doctor didn't seem worried I go in 2.5 weeks for my last ultrasound (growth scan) and I'll be 34 weeks
That normal i dnt havent wit my 1st either but they can tell u if u guna have a big small or normail size baby an if its big they can schedule u to have a c section. Its good to no so u be fine. :)
Its normal. I had one at 37 weeks too. If the fluid level is too low and you're full term, they will induce you.
I just had an ultrasound yesterday and I'm 36 weeks 2 days; my doctor checked my babys position.

I would say its normal I only had 2 ultrasounds with my first son and with this pregnancy I have had 4 and Monday I am getting my 5th ultrasound done my doctor says its just because my baby was measuring really big he was 6.5lbs at 34weeks  so maybe its just because your baby is measuring big
Thanks everyone. Makes me worry less :)
Your welcome congrats on the new baby by the way

Some doctors are just different. It's weird, I know what you mean. In Tucson I had my last ultra sound some time around 20 weeks, here in California I get them at every visit. I'll also be 36 weeks tomorrow. I think it's just how different doctors do things.

I'd say normal as I'm scheduled for one a week from today that's my 5th with this pregnancy. I'll be 36/4 then and they didn't mention any particular reason for it. This is my 3rd pregnancy but first without weekly u/s due to Gestational Diabetes so I just kinda go with the flow this time around.

question: This is my second pregnancy and I had an apt yesterday. He said he was going to do another ultrasound next visit to check fluid and the size of the baby. I didn't have this with my first. With her, the last ultrasound was at 20 weeks. Is this normal or should I be worried something is wrong? He didn't say anything was but other people keep asking me if everything is ok when I tell them and it's worrying me! Any help appreciated
title: Ultrasound at 36 weeks?
